snippet: Eli Manning, the two-time Super Bowl most valuable player, found limited opportunities against the Cowboys. He completed 21 of 32 passes for 213 yards and a touchdown.
abstract: New York Giants quarterback Eli Manning, the two-time Super Bowl most valuable player, finds limited opportunities in season-opening loss to the Dallas Cowboys, completing 21 of 32 passes for 213 yards and a touchdown.
lead_paragraph: Eli Manning, the two-time Super Bowl most valuable player, found limited opportunities against the Cowboys. He completed 21 of 32 passes for 213 yards and a touchdown.

headline.seo: For Giants, Winning the Super Bowl May Have Been the Easy Part
headline.main: Manning Fails to Solve Cowboys’ New Look on Defense
headline.print_headline: Manning Fails to Solve Cowboys’ New Look on Defense
